info.title: PINS Back Office Appeals API
info.description: PINS Back Office Appeals API documentation from Swagger

get.description: Gets a single address by id

200.description: Gets a single address by id

patch.description: Updates a single address by id

200.description: Updates a single address by id

post.description: Closes an appeal by setting the inspector decision

200.description: Gets the decision info or null

post.description: Starts an appeal by creating a timetable

200.description: Creates an appeal timetable and start the appeal

requestBody.description: Appeal and optional start date (defaults to the current date, if omitted)

patch.description: Updates a single appeal timetable by id

200.description: Updates a single appeal timetable by id

post.description: Request the creation of a new case
Request adding LPA response to an existing case
Validates a date to ensure is a business day
Adds specified number of business days to the given date

get.description: Gets appellant case incomplete reasons
Gets the list of specialisms used for allocation
Gets the list of levels and associated bands used for allocation

patch.description: Adds or changes allocation for an appeal

get.description: Gets appellant case invalid reasons
Gets appellant case validation outcomes
Gets document redaction statuses
Gets knowledge of other landowners values
Gets LPA notification methods
Gets LPA questionnaire incomplete reasons
Gets LPA questionnaire validation outcomes
Gets procedure types
Gets site visit types
Gets representation rejection reasons
Gets requested appeals, limited to the first 30 appeals if no pagination params are given

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The pagination page number - required if pageSize is given

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The pagination page size - required if pageNumber is given

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: The search term - does a partial, case-insensitive match of appeal reference and postcode fields

parameters.name: lpaCode
parameters.description: The lpa filter is assigned an an lpa code

parameters.name: inspectorId
parameters.description: The inspector filter is assigned an an inspector id

parameters.name: caseOfficerId
parameters.description: The case officer filter is assigned an an case officer id

parameters.name: isGreenBelt
parameters.description: The Green belt filter is applied

get.description: Gets appeals assigned to the current user

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The pagination page number - required if pageSize is given

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The pagination page size - required if pageNumber is given

requestBody.description: Documents to update for AV report

delete.description: Delete a document version and sets the previous as current version

200.description: Returns a single document by id

post.description: Records a request to change the appeal type
Records a request to transfer the appeal to another system
Confirms the transfer of the appeal to another system
Links an appeal to the current appeal
Links a legacy appeal (on Horizon) to the current appeal
Associate an appeal to the current appeal, as related
Links a legacy appeal (on Horizon) to the current appeal

post.description: Adds a neighbouring site with an address to an existing appeal

patch.description: Updates a neighbouring site from its id

delete.description: Deletes a neighbouring from its id

requestBody.description: The id of the neighbouring site to delete

get.description: Returns all the case notes for an appeal

200.description: returns an array of case notes

post.description: Post a case note for an appeal

get.description: Gets a single related appeal by id from BO or Horizon. If mocking use 1000000 for valid case on horizon, 2000000 for unpublished case on horizon, any for case not found on horizon

200.description: Gets a single related appeal by reference from BO or Horizon

get.description: Gets appeal from Horizon returns found status (true/false). If mocking use 1000000 for valid case on horizon, 2000000 for unpublished case on horizon, any for case not found on horizon

200.description: Gets appeal from Horizon returns found status (true/false)

example: Appellant name is not the same on the application form and appeal form
Attachments and/or appendices have not been included to the full statement of case
